careTargets.gradient: Basking perch at 90°F, ambient 78–85°F, cool side 75°F

notes: Arboreal; require vertical space with climbing branches and perches
Small (5-8 inches); can change color from green to brown based on mood/temperature
Males are territorial; keep solitary (never house together)
Fast-moving; exciting to watch but not ideal for frequent handling
Live insects only; mostly insectivores with minimal vegetable matter

warnings.message: Males are extremely territorial. House singly only. Never house two males together - they will fight to death.
Live insects only (crickets, roaches, small flies). Dust with calcium 3-4x per week. No prepared foods.
Anoles are fragile. They can drop their tails if grabbed roughly or handled excessively. Handle minimally.
Green anoles are stunning but short-lived (4-8 years). They're beginner-friendly but require high humidity and vertical space.
